segments.text: I'm fixated on that stool the boy is standing on; it's practically dancing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are so splayed, making it look ready to collapse at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, reaching into that cookie jar, completely focused on his prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he balances, with one hand in the jar and a plate in the other, is quite a feat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it's a dangerous feat, and I can almost see it tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little anxious just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below seems unaware of the immediate risk, only the reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's looking up, palm open, expecting a cookie to drop into it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool goes over, it's not just cookies that will be scattered.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could really hurt himself in this pursuit of a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone else seeing this impending disaster?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to witness such a clear danger play out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
